refnamediv.refpurpose: Group of one or more skills

refsect1.title: Description

important.para: This element is deprecated as of &library.name; version 1.3.4. It should not be used.

skill elements are now allowed as direct children of skillset, so skills is no longer necessary. skills is still allowed in this release of &library.name;, but may be removed in future versions. It is recommended that you remove all skills elements from XML &resume;s.

refsect1.para: The skills element contains one or more (usually related) skills.

refsect2.title: Parents
refsect2.para: skills may be contained in these elements:

listitem.para: A string used to uniquely identify a skills group. The group may then be referred to by this identifier.

informalexample.programlisting: <skills> <skill>Leaping over tall buildings in a single bound</skill> <skill>Flying</skill> <skill>Quickly changing clothes</skill> </skill>
